title: Biscayne National Park: Where to Stay
body: Where to Stay       There are no hotels, motels, lodges or cabins inside Biscayne National Park. The nearest lodging to the park's Dante Fascell Visitor Center is located in Homestead or Florida City. There are two campgrounds in the park. They are accessible by boat only. Visit our camping page for details. There are no overnight RV sites in the park.
